formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["thompson.gov@email.com"],"subject":"Information About Disability Accommodations","body":"Dear Mr. Thompson,

Thank you for reaching out with your inquiry about our disability accommodations. At Grandview University, we are committed to providing equal access to education for all individuals. In compliance with federal regulations, we offer a variety of accommodations to support students with disabilities. These provisions include extended time for exams, note-taking services, and adaptive technology.

We encourage students requiring accommodations to contact the Office of Student Accessibility Services for more information or to initiate a request for specific accommodations. Please let me know if there are any additional details or assistance you need.

Best regards,
[Your Name/Position]"}

formatted_items.content: I have responded to Mr. Thompson's inquiry about disability accommodations, providing details based on the available information. Let me know if there's anything else you'd like me to address!
